item.description:
How About We is coordinating free events this week to commemorate their Boston launch. Their first event is December 1st at the Museum of Fine Arts in Boston, where people will be gathering at 6:30PM to tour the new Art of the Americas wing.

At ~8:30PM, the group will head to a local bar TBD.

1. At the MFA, we'll meet in the New American Cafe at 6.30pm.
2. If you can't make the MFA part of the night, meet us at the Savant Project (1625 Tremont Street; Brigham Circle stop on the Green Line). We'll try to get there around 8.30pm.

How About We is a subscription dating site organized around date-ideas, that started in NYC and recently raised $3.1M in a venture capital round led by RRE Ventures.
item.how_to_find_us: Museum lobby at 6:30PM--meet up with the How About We group

group.name: The Cambridge and Boston Singles Meetup

item.name: A Night at the Museum
